name: SkynetV2
short: AI assistant with chat and tools
description: LLM-powered assistant for Red-DiscordBot with multi-provider support.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores minimal configuration and optional conversation context. It does not share data with third parties beyond configured AI providers.
install_msg: Thanks for installing SkynetV2! Use [p]skynet to get started.
